feature.label: EMF-Splitter Directory Integration
feature.description:
This feature includes the functionality to integrate the Directory Drawer of SAMPLER with EMF-Splitter projects.
It add a new Open-With option and some listeners to open EMF Model fragments when double-clicking Files on the Directory Drawer.
